tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CrimeIncidenceData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crime_incidents (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crime_analysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_incident (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    crime_type_id INT,
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES crime_location(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crime_type_id) REFERENCES crime_type(crime_type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CrimeReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  reported_by VARCHAR(50),
  reported_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CrimeReportAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analyzed_by VARCHAR(50),
  analysis_datetime TIMESTAMP
);
